Author: GitHub
Title: GitHub Issues now uses semantic search
Description:
GitHub has released an improved search for issues in public preview, utilizing semantic search to understand the intent behind your query. Say goodbye to getting zero results just because you didn't use the exact keyword. Testing shows this new natural language approach is 39% better than traditional search.

#GitHubIssues #SemanticSearch #GitHub
